item.title: Meme 股票 GameStop 在售股筹资 9.33 亿美元后大涨
item.description: Meme 股票 GameStop 周二在盘前交易中飙升近 20%，因为这家陷入困境的电子游戏零售商称，在本月早些时候的市场反弹中，它通过出售股票筹集了超过 9 亿美元的资金。【原文：Meme stock GameStop soared nearly 20% in premarket trading on Tuesday after the struggling videogame retailer said it had raised over $900 million from selling its shares during the market rally earlier this month.】

item.title: 瑞银将标普 500 指数年底目标上调至 5600 点的最高水平
item.description: 瑞银全球研究公司（UBS Global Research）周二将基准 S&P 500 指数的年终目标上调至 5600 点，在主要券商中预测最高。【原文：UBS Global Research raised its year-end target for the benchmark S&P 500 index to 5,600 points on Tuesday, marking the highest forecast among major brokerages.】

item.title: 市场等待通胀数据，期指稳步上扬
item.description: 在周末假期结束后，美国股指期货周二走高，投资者在等待本周晚些时候的一份关键通胀报告，该报告可能会对美联储的货币政策前景预期构成考验。【原文：U.S. stock index futures ticked higher on Tuesday after a holiday-extended weekend, as investors awaited a key inflation report later in the week that could test expectations of the Federal Reserve's monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: 加快股票交收为 ETF 市场带来独特障碍
item.description: 市场参与者表示，美国证券交易周二将改为次日结算，这将要求交易所交易基金（ETF）和做市商兼顾多个司法管辖区的要求和资本需求。【原文：The move to next-day settlement for trading in U.S. securities on Tuesday will require exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and the marketmakers to juggle multiple jurisdictional requirements and capital needs, market participants said.】

item.title: 华尔街为加快贸易结算做好准备
item.description: 美国交易周二将改用较短的结算时间，监管机构希望这将降低全球最大市场的风险并提高效率，但预计会暂时增加投资者的交易失败率。【原文：U.S. trading moves to a shorter settlement on Tuesday, which regulators hope will reduce risk and improve efficiency in the world's largest markets, but is expected to temporarily increase transaction failure for investors.】

item.title: 聚焦：评级公司谨慎批准部分私人信用贷款
item.description: 银行和保险公司正在向美国信贷机构提出更多请求，要求对其向私募股权基金提供的高风险贷款进行评级，这些贷款是以其投资组合的价值及其产生的现金流为抵押的。【原文：Banks and insurers are making more requests to U.S. credit agencies for ratings on their risky loans to private equity funds that are secured against the value of their portfolio investments and cash flows that come from them.】

item.title: 随着供应量增长，减肥药预测值跃升至 1,500 亿美元
item.description: 随着数百万人开始使用诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）和礼来（Eli Lilly）公司生产的减肥药，供应量的增加、可能的更广泛使用以及潜在竞争对手的不断增多，使得一些专家将这种疗法的全球年销售额预测提高到 2030 年代初的 1,500 亿美元左右。【原文：As millions seek access to weight-loss drugs from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly , increasing supplies, possible wider usage and a growing number of would-be rivals are leading some experts to raise annual global sales forecasts for the treatments to about $150 billion by the early 2030s.】

item.title: 早间竞价休市后的华尔街保持强劲势头
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 数据显示，4 月份苹果公司 iPhone 在中国的销量猛增 52
item.description: 路透社周二根据行业数据计算得出的结果显示，苹果公司 4 月份在中国的 iPhone 销量同比猛增 52%。【原文：Apple saw its iPhone sales in China jump 52% in April from a year earlier, Reuters calculations based on industry data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利希望在降息前在通胀问题上取得重大进展
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）在周二接受美国全国广播公司（CNBC）采访时表示，美国央行应等待通胀取得重大进展后再降息。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve Bank President Neel Kashkari said in an interview with CNBC broadcast on Tuesday that the U.S. central bank should wait for significant progress on inflation before cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 代理公司 Glass Lewis 建议投票反对丰田汽车董事长
item.description: 代理咨询公司 Glass Lewis 建议丰田汽车股东在该公司 6 月份的年度股东大会上投票反对重新选举董事长丰田章男，认为董事会不够独立。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Glass Lewis has recommended Toyota Motor shareholders vote against re-electing Chairman Akio Toyoda at the Japanese automaker's annual general meeting in June, saying the board was not sufficiently independent.】

item.title: COVID 之后，中国重返非洲，加倍开采矿产
item.description: 根据路透社对贷款、投资和贸易数据的分析，中国的旗舰经济合作项目在经历了全球大流行病期间的低迷后正在反弹，其中非洲是主要重点。【原文：China's flagship economic cooperation program is bouncing back after a lull during the global pandemic, with Africa a primary focus, according to a Reuters analysis of lending, investment and trade data.】

item.title: 日本央行 4 月份基本通胀率均低于 2
item.description: 周二的数据显示，日本央行4月份衡量基本通胀率的关键指标均低于2%的目标，这是自2022年8月以来的首次，从而加剧了日本央行下次加息时间的不确定性。【原文：The Bank of Japan's key measurements of underlying inflation in April all fell below its 2% target for the first time since August 2022, data showed on Tuesday, heightening uncertainty on the timing of its next interest rate hike.】

item.title: 欧洲和亚洲旅客为节省开支，机票价格达到顶峰
item.description: 欧洲和亚洲的机票价格开始趋于平稳或下降，这表明 "后COVID "时代的长期旅行热潮正在减退，这给苦于成本上升和飞机供应有限的航空公司带来了挫折。【原文：Airfares in Europe and Asia are starting to plateau or fall in a sign that a prolonged post-COVID travel boom is waning, delivering a setback for airlines struggling with higher costs and limited aircraft availability.】

item.title: 美联储梅斯特：美联储声明若能增加一些篇幅将大有裨益
item.description: 克利夫兰联储主席洛雷塔-梅斯特（Loretta Mester）周二表示，美联储的政策声明将受益于比目前更长的篇幅，以描述对经济发展的评估、经济发展对央行前景的影响以及经济前景面临的风险。【原文：Federal Reserve policy statements would benefit from somewhat lengthier passages than currently employed to describe assessments of economic developments, how that influences the central bank's outlook and the risks to that outlook, Cleveland Fed President Loretta Mester said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼：会支持等待缩减资产负债表缩表
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周二表示，她支持等待开始放缓美国中央银行资产负债表的缩减速度，或者支持比本月早些时候宣布的更为温和的缩减进程。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman on Tuesday said she would have supported either waiting to start slowing the run-off in the U.S. central bank's balance sheet or a more moderate tapering process than announced earlier this month.】

item.title: 早间竞标：通胀预期
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 丰田展示可适应不同燃料的紧凑型发动机
item.description: 丰田汽车周二展示了新一代发动机，这些发动机可用于混合动力汽车和使用生物燃料的汽车，丰田正瞄准更严格的排放标准，并加倍努力实施其战略，销售的不仅仅是电动汽车。【原文：Toyota Motor showcased next-generation engines on Tuesday that can be used in cars as varied as hybrids and those running on biofuel, as it targets tougher emissions standards and doubles down on its strategy of selling more than just EVs.】

item.title: 焦点转向美国通胀数据，黄金持稳
item.description: 周二，金价持稳，因为美元汇率有所回落，而投资者则期待着关键的美国通胀数据，这些数据可能为美联储多快能够降息提供线索。【原文：Gold prices held steady on Tuesday as the dollar eased, while investors looked forward to key U.S. inflation data that could offer clues on how soon the Federal Reserve can cut interest rates.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡维持利率以管理通胀、促进经济稳定
item.description: 斯里兰卡中央银行周二维持利率稳定，以确保通货膨胀压力继续受到控制，因为当局希望在这个南亚国家经历数十年来最严重的金融危机之后促进经济稳定和增长。【原文：Sri Lanka's central bank held interest rates steady on Tuesday to ensure inflation pressures remain in check as authorities look to foster economic stability and lift growth following the South Asian nation's worst financial crisis in decades.】

item.title: 亚洲股市反弹后漂移，华尔街重开成焦点
item.description: 亚洲股市在上一交易日反弹后，周二走势不一，因为对欧洲即将降息的押注不断升温，在一些关键通胀数据公布前助长了风险偏好。【原文：Asian shares held a mixed tone on Tuesday after rallying the previous session, as rising bets of an imminent European rate cut helped risk appetite ahead of some key inflation data.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 4 月份零售额增长缓慢
item.description: 澳大利亚 4 月份的零售额悄然走高，原因是购物者在借贷成本高企和房租上涨的情况下保持节俭，这再次表明家庭支出对本季度经济增长的贡献微乎其微。【原文：Australian retail sales crept higher in April as shoppers stayed frugal in the face of high borrowing costs and rising rents, another sign household spending will add little to economic growth this quarter.】

item.title: 新西兰收紧部分住房贷款规定
item.description: 新西兰央行周二对住房贷款机构向希望承担与其收入相比高额债务的借款人提供住房贷款的额度做出了限制。【原文：New Zealand's central bank on Tuesday introduced limits on how much housing finance lenders can provide for borrowers who want to take on a high amount of debt relative to their incomes.】

item.title: 日本商业服务价格以 2015 年 3 月以来最快的年度速度上涨
item.description: 日本央行周二公布的数据显示，受服务业劳动力成本推动，4月份日本企业服务价格创下自2015年初以来的最快涨幅，这对寻求以工资为主导的需求增长周期的决策者来说是一个积极信号。【原文：Japanese corporate services prices in April rose at their fastest pace since early 2015, Bank of Japan data showed on Tuesday, boosted by labour costs in the services sector in a positive signal for policymakers looking for wages-led cycle of demand growth.】

item.title: 投资者等待通胀数据和欧佩克+会议，油价保持稳定
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价持稳，投资者在等待通胀数据，以评估美国未来的货币政策，以及6月2日欧佩克+会议的生产政策决定。【原文：Oil prices were steady in early Asian trading on Tuesday as investors awaited inflation data to assess future U.S. monetary policy and the production policy decisions from the OPEC+ meeting on June 2.】

item.title: 市场等待重要的全球通胀报告，美元走低
item.description: 在风险偏好略有回升之后，美元汇率在周二有所回落，但在本周主要经济体公布关键通胀数据之前，美元兑其他货币保持在较窄区间，市场正期待这些数据为全球利率前景提供指引。【原文：The dollar waned on Tuesday following a slight pick up in risk appetite, but it held tight ranges against its peers ahead of key inflation data from major economies this week that markets are looking to for guidance on the global interest rate outlook.】

item.title: 2023 年日本对外净资产创历史新高，仍是世界第一大债权国
item.description: 日本财务省（Ministry of Finance）周二表示，由于日元疲软和海外企业收购提升了日本的海外资产价值，2023 年日本的对外净资产将增至创纪录的 471.3 万亿日元（约合 3 万亿美元），连续第六年增长。【原文：Japan's net external assets rose to a record 471.3 trillion yen ($3 trillion) in 2023, increasing for a sixth straight year, as a weak yen and overseas corporate acquisitions boosted the value of its foreign assets, the Ministry of Finance said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国石油公司（BP）、壳牌石油公司（Shell）和美国石油天然气公司（EOG）在特立尼达石油天然气拍卖会上争夺耕地面积
item.description: 特立尼达和多巴哥 2023 年浅水区拍卖于周一结束，共收到来自英国石油公司（BP）、壳牌石油公司（Shell）和美国页岩油生产商 EOG Resources 的六份标书，竞拍四个油气勘探区块。【原文：Trinidad and Tobago received six bids from BP , Shell and US shale producer EOG Resources on four blocks to explore for oil and gas as its 2023 shallow water auction closed on Monday.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司暂时中止墨西哥城-基多航线
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司周一表示，将暂时中止墨西哥城至厄瓜多尔首都基多的航线。【原文：Mexican carrier Aeromexico is temporarily suspending its route from Mexico City to the Ecuadorean capital of Quito, the airline said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长称巴西通胀预期将逐步改善
item.description: 巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）周一表示，决策者认为通胀预期应随着时间的推移趋于稳定和改善，而最近他又提到了对通胀预期偏离官方目标的担忧。【原文：Brazil's central bank chief Roberto Campos Neto said on Monday that policymakers believe inflation expectations should stabilize and improve over time, after recently citing concerns about them deviating from the official target.】
